alert.note: Alert for Gage; Pawnee (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 8:14AM CDT until June 12 at 8:45AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 AM CDT FOR PAWNEE AND SOUTHERN GAGE COUNTIES... At 814 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles northwest of Barneston, or 14 miles southeast of Beatrice, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Beatrice, Pawnee City, Wymore, Blue Springs, Odell, Table Rock, Summerfield, Du Bois, Barneston, Burchard, Liberty, Holmesville, Steinauer and Rockford State Recreation Area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
